section.title:
sales history
summarized by customer type
customer types
sales history summarized by Summarized Sales History by Customer Type
section.para: To view summarized Sales history by Customer Type, select the "Summarized Sales History by Customer Type" option. The following screen will appear:

mediaobject.caption: Summarized Sales History by Customer Type

section.para: When displaying summarized Sales history by Customer Type, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to display summarized Sales history for all Customer Types.
Specify Customer Type whose summarized Sales history you want to display.
Enter a Customer Type pattern to select a range of Customer Types.
Refine your search using Regular Expressions, as described in Pattern Matching with Regular Expressions"Topic: Pattern Matching with Regular Expressions".
Summarized Sales history by Customer Type generated on or after this date will be displayed.
Summarized Sales history by Customer Type generated on or before this date will be displayed.
Select to display summarized Sales history by Customer Type for all Warehouses.
Specify Warehouse whose summarized Sales history by Customer Type you want to display.
Display lists summarized Sales history by Customer Type, using the specified parameters.

section.para: To the far right of the screen, the following buttons are available:

listitem.para: Closes the screen, returning you to the application desktop.
Select to generate the display, using the specified parameters.
Runs the report associated with this screen.
